notes: Phase 25 complete. Added pdf 3.11.3 + share_plus 7.2.2 deps. Created ReportDataService interface + ReportRow class, ReportExportService interface. ReportDataServiceImpl (12 repos, lookup maps for names, partial-failure resilient, rows sorted ascending). ReportExportServiceImpl (pw.Document PDF tables, StringBuffer CSV, injectable getDirectory for tests). Wired Export PDF + Export CSV buttons in reports_tab.dart with _isExporting spinner. Share.shareXFiles called AFTER setState(_isExporting=false) so pumpAndSettle can settle in tests. _FakeReportExportService avoids real file I/O. 22 new tests (8 unit for data service, 10 unit for export service, 4 new widget tests). Analyzer clean. Next: await Architect review.
